website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Z50 is about as no-frills as you get for a multimedia speaker, but at $20 it's not a bad deal for the sound it delivers.
pros: The Logitech Z50 plays loud for its compact size, is simple to set up and use, and takes up very little room on a desk
Best of all, it only costs around $20 and works with nearly every device
cons: the exposed speaker driver might get damaged if something is dropped on it
bass is light and the speaker can distort at higher volumes

customer_reviews.title: Use grounded connection
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews complaining about the buzzing sound and was concerned. It made the buzzing sound when my kindle fire was turned off (it was attached through a non-grounded extension cord. Then I switched from the extension cord to a grounded surge protector...all buzzing stopped....it's the answer.
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking with a hum that will drive you up a wall
customer_reviews.text: I am a classroom teacher and I have this plugged into my computer as the only speaker for the classroom. It looks good, but it makes a continuous humming sound even when I have my computer on mute. When I turn it upside down, the humming is less, but it is always there. When I am using the speaker the sound is good. The humming drives me crazy! I'm looking for a replacement, and will use this on a home computer that's more convenient to unplug when not in use. The price is great, obviously, and since I buy many of my own supplies I need to be frugal.
customer_reviews.author: DebraToby

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Alexa Dot.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the sound is not spectacular but fine for news, music alarms and general Alexa interactions. The high marks for simplicity and ease of use with the Dot; simply plug it into the wall and the Dot and you're done. Unlike using the Dot with a portable Bluetooth speaker, there's no pairing, charging or power on/off issues to deal with; it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A. Soukup

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Speaker
customer_reviews.text: For $14 or even a little higher this was worth the price. If you are looking for small active speaker that has to rely on AC power then this is a great addition. Personally, I use this in my bathroom paired with a chromecast audio, because I wanted something small, match the coloring, and did not need to be charged. The audio quality is OK; good for listening to podcast and some music, if you are looking for something with a lot of bass then this is not for you. That being said its a great little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Remington Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Small Speaker for Work Desk - Voice Reproduction is Surprisingly Good.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my office, so my needs were different than they would be for a speaker I use at home. I mostly use it to listen to news and a little background music but at low volume. I wanted it to be small, and decent sound, but didn't care about stereo sound, loudness, controls. This met all my needs and then some. The quality of sound for voice (news, audiobook) is surprisingly good; there's enough bass to make the voices sound full. My only gripe is that I wish the phono cord was a bit longer, but that's easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bought in 2013!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I got this thing back in 2013! It's been on my desk hooked up to my PC ever since and I use it regularly. For a small speaker, it sounds good and is more than loud enough. Every once in a while I'll move it to another room to listen to music with my phone. My only complaint is the audio jack is not removable from the unit and incredibly short. This limits placement on my desk and can be irritating, but I'm very happy with the quality and longevity of the product and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennarally Contrary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic clarity
customer_reviews.text: This monaural rendition of stereo signals from 3.5 mm jacks is wonderfully clear and easy to understand. Reflects I think the recent improvements to speaker technology that have been occurring. I find computer speakers are quite hard to understand, decided to try some compact alternative, and stereo is not important for my purposes. Wow, this is the perfect solution. Since I liked it for computer sound, I also tried it for talking on my iPhone and was even more impressed. Note that the device has no volume control, so volume must be adjusted at the source.
customer_reviews.author: luckymr

customer_reviews.title: sad birthday
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son birthday to use with his tablet- didn't realize it until it was opened but it has a foreign plug and is unusable to us. I bought it a little more than 30 days ago and cannot return
customer_reviews.author: alwaysonlineshopping

customer_reviews.title: "Sweet spot" product
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I would not consider buying any other desktop speaker. This thing is just *the bomb*. It will not "rock the walls", but that's not what it's supposed to do. It will provide an *excellent* sound for a small office, however. Best desktop PC speaker I have ever heard. Love it. I love this thing. I know it's hard for people wearing skinny jeans to understand the desire for a quality, compact, desktop PC speaker, but this thing fits the bill 100%. Amazing quality for what it is. If it died today, I would buy another one. Great, great speaker and not that expensive. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small speaker for my laptop to listen to music with because my laptop speakers sound really bad. I tried several different styles and sizes and found this one to have the best sound! Big bonus is how inexpensive it is. Great value for the money. It sounds better than ones I tried that were double the price. Here's the negatives: it has to be plugged into the headphone jack on the computer which sucks because whenever you touch the cord, it makes a loud static noise. Another negative is that it has a quiet buzzing sound always present when music isn't playing. Overall, its a good speaker though,
customer_reviews.author: jlvc89

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: This is an adequate speaker for listening to music or podcasts in a smallish room, but certainly nothing to rave about. As other reviews have mentioned, it easily hums and buzzes with feedback if you cross the wires. I have found that once placed in a stationary position the hum goes away. It is definitely not very loud even for a small gathering of people, and at max volume on my phone it was still pretty quiet. I'm keeping it because I like to listen to podcasts in my bedroom, and I'd prefer an aux-in non bluetooth, non battery speaker. This works but I won't be picking up extras as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: RaisinBran

customer_reviews.title: A simple design that works great
customer_reviews.text: This "portable" speaker suits my purpose. It's the second time I've purchased this product. I call it portable because it's so easy to unplug and move to another room, like into the bathroom to use while I'm taking a shower. As long as I can find speakers that #1 use AC and #2 aren't bluetooth, that's what I'll be using, and this one works great. If you want fancy, like volume control, wireless, etc, this isn't it. But if you enjoy no-fuss, here you go.
customer_reviews.author: cooee

customer_reviews.title: More than good enough to let me listen to my music while ...
customer_reviews.text: More than good enough to let me listen to my music while working on my computer. And the best thing about this, to me anyway, is that it is just one thing. Not two separate speakers. Much less clutter. I would certainly recommend this for the general purpose computer user who needs a sound output. My new computer and my monitor were speakerless, so I needed something. This was an excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. PinkertonTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: A great speaker in a small package!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time, in perfect condition. I LOVE it! In place of my tinny tiny tablet speaker, I now have a speaker with better quality than I expected for something it's size. It's potable, handy,and sounds better than I'd hoped. I recommend this product. Note: if the audio plug isn't pushed all the way into the socket on your tablet or laptop, it makes a HORRIBLE racket! Don't panic, just reinsert the plug into the socket, making sure it's in all the way. When it's in place it is, the noise is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker for my laptop. It is the perfect size because it's not too big. I was looking for something to put next to my laptop in my classroom to use when teaching lessons. The sound is clear and just the right volume needed for them to hear. When I'm done I can put it away without taking up too much space. It is easy to take with you if traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Merc Vaz

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and nice and loud but you have to control the volume from your tablet or smart phone.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It has very good sound and it is cheap. The only problem is that you have to control the volume from your tablet or smart phone. It doesn't have a volume control on it. My husband and I like to listen to audible stories together and my tablet is just not loud enough for us to both hear it while we are sitting in different parts of the room. This really does increase the volume of your smartphone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Sheperde

customer_reviews.title: Work great with Echo Dot - Even better after a quick fix
customer_reviews.text: I got this paired to an echo dot in my kitchen. It's surprisingly good, very loud, but for music the midrange is way too high. well, it was way to high. Do this and you will love it. Say this twice "Alexa, turn down the midrange" Then say this twice "Alexa, turn up the treble" Adjust the volume after this and enjoy your music from the echo dot! Much better balanced sound and the bass sounds better now the the midrange isn't crazy high. Voices are much less shouty.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Really not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Was elated that there is actually a speaker that does not have anything else built into it... I wanted a power cord, an audio cable, and no assistant/blue tooth/wifi or aaaaanything other crap... so elated to find this guy and really wanted to love this guy... but..... It's not very loud at all and the pop/crackle when I plug in the audio cord is awful (and since you cant turn this speaker on/off... youd have to unplug the sepeaker... then connect the cable.... then plug the speaker back in..... ehh, sorry Logitech! But still, nothing but respect for Logitech even making this thing, no one else does!
customer_reviews.author: E. E. Mort

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again if and when I need one
customer_reviews.text: For the price I feel it's extremely good. Not a music speaker in my opinion meaning I'd rather have dual speakers for that but for a computer speaker more than satisfactory. Good sound meaning no cracking or hissing etc. Very clear and sharp sounds. The design of the speaker is unusual in that the sound is directed upward but slightly forward you due to the shape of the top nothing like normal speakers facing you but that is exactly what I wanted as I will listen to talk radio while moving around the room so that works fine for me. Seems built well as all Logitech products are.
customer_reviews.author: lcm1947

customer_reviews.title: Great for Laptops!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and several others at my school have purchased this speaker for their laptops, so I followed suit and glad I did! The sound quality is Really Good, no echo or crackling. Other reviewers have complained about the lack of a volume control on the speaker. If you are using this for a laptop it’s not even an inconvenience as you can just push a button in front of you On the laptop! Myself and other staff at this school can highly recommend this Logitech speaker! 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed. Product description does not mention that the power ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed. Product description does not mention that the power cord plug is not suitable for outlets in the United States.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Nice standalone speaker for projects.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a standalone speaker I could use to attach to a Raspberry Pi for a project. This speaker worked great for this purpose. Sounds was loud enough, though I wish volume could be controlled. It comes with a wall wort power adapter and 3.5mm standard audio cable that is hardwiredto the speaker so if the cable were to break, the entire speaker would be useless. I wish instead it just had an audio jack so one could plug their own audio cable in to it. Overall, not a bad single speaker for a PC or other device using the standard 3.5mm audio plug.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and I have been going burs trying to find a speaker that would make my crappy, 9 year old school issued computer audible for movies and videos as part of lessons, after trying two usb speakers and one other headphone jack speaker, this is the only one that has worked. It is very powerful, and fills the room with sound. Excellent purchase. I’ll let you know how long it keeps it up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Soto

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my tablet. Since I play keyboards and I like to learn new songs, I use my tablet with this speaker to learn new music. Will it sound as loud as a large speaker or amp? No, but it's loud enough for my purposes and it has relatively good sound quality for its size. I've recommended it to friends who use it with their computer or tablet and they have all been satisfied with it, too. If you are looking for a speaker to fill a room with sound, this is not that. If you need a personal speaker to fit your area where you sit, this works well.
customer_reviews.author: mrs. goodwrench

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE HASSLE!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the price and would be nice if the cord was longer. UPDATE: It’s only been about 15 months and the cord wires are exposed and speaker not working! I contacted the Logitech Company because Amazon won’t offer a replacement cord. This has been a real-time consuming hassle!!!! There aren’t much details on the site of what type of cord I need to purchase so I purchased one on Amazon and it was the wrong one and now I have to ship it back. I asked logitech to send me a new cord or let me order one they said it’s discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Dee A

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Footprint, Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my needs. It is small - about the size of a large soup mug. I use it for my desktop. It takes up very little space. The sound is good. I need a speaker to hear YouTube and other online instruction videos. It is clear and succinct. Unfortunately, there are no volume controls on the device. I control it through the computer. It comes with the power cord and speaker-to-device wire. If the speaker connector is damaged, you will have a problem as it is permanently affixed to the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: PresPetunia

customer_reviews.title: Give your Dot some oomph
customer_reviews.text: Recently got an Echo Dot for cheap and the speaker leaves a lot to be desired. This little speaker helps give you a little oomph. Don't expect super high quality but it's a definite step up for the little Dot. Alexa's voice is much clearer and music sounds okay too.
customer_reviews.author: Chilehead Craig

customer_reviews.title: I got a good deal on it
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought this was a bluetooth speaker which is what I was really looking for but once I received this speaker, I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it. Plus, I got a good deal on it. I bought it to use with my laptop at work, only needed it when I'd present videos to classrooms. It's a good small size and actually is pretty loud. Great and easy to carry around from classroom to classroom. I even got other colleagues to purchase it since they liked it so much!
customer_reviews.author: w621s

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speaker
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with this speaker. The sound is wonderful. It has no hum whatsoever and it does not sound tinny. The size is non-intrusive. I am pro-Logitech and this is another fine product of theirs. I've played games, videos, movies, and music with it and the sound is shockingly terrific for a smaller speaker. I haven't used it with my Fire 10 tablet yet. I bought it to use with my laptop and I leave it plugged into the laptop all the time. I control the volume through my laptop. I recommend this speaker with no reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and advertised as "easy", but it isn't that great.
customer_reviews.text: I've invested some of my money into Logitech over the years, and yes, while they are a budget company with some "high end" products, for the most part you are getting a little less than what you paid for. I feel like I could have gotten a little better product for this price. I never realized how big a volume control on the speaker would be. And also maybe an on/off button would be helpful. It sometimes creates feedback with some of the other devices I have plugged in on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: SK Lee

customer_reviews.title: No more charging! 🔊 🔌
customer_reviews.text: I bought this aux speaker because I was tired of having to alternate between TWO Bluetooth speakers. Every other day I had to charge them so I finally took a chance. This speaker is small, and has great sound. It doesn’t have bass nor as loud as my Bluetooth ones, but worth it and loud enough for a laptop. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: o_O WebMonkey

customer_reviews.title: The best little speaker I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: It is about four inches high and the diameter just slightly less. I was having a problem with my Bluetooth. I bought this as a simple plug-in device for the phone jack's audio and the laptop's. Fits perfectly. The sound is a nice blend of high and low-end sound. Volume is way good. It's perfect for me. I'm no audiophile. But I have been messing with speakers since I was twelve in 1968. It does have to be plugged into an electricity source. The connecting cord, however, is a very long one given the relatively small size of the unit. It outdoes many speakers I can recall using. Crisp sound. Very COOL.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Young

customer_reviews.title: Classical music - who knew?
customer_reviews.text: My new minimalist computer has neither a sound card nor speakers built in. I bought one of these and a USB sound card so I could listen to voice mail. I liked it so much that I bought a second one for home. While checking on my online radio subscription I inadvertently started playing classical music over this little puppy, and it sounds great! Well ok, a 4 x 4 is never going to deliver like full sized speakers but I've never listened to classical on any computer speakers before. Because the footprint is so small it's up behind my monitor instead of tucked away, which certainly contributes to the audio fidelity. I am allround beyond satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Colton

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for a senior with hearing aids!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this speaker for my 90-something Father-in-law to solve an issue between his flip-phone and hearing aids. He cannot use a cellphone with a flat screen due to vision issues--must be able to feel the buttons to make a call. When the flip-phone is put up to his ear, there was a buzzing noise due to his hearing aids. There is not a speaker phone option on this older flip-phone. He could not hear the caller due to the buzzing. This speaker solves the issue since he uses the flip-phone primarily at home. The sound from this little speaker is very good--no extraneous humming at all. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Slotterback

customer_reviews.title: Loud enough to be heard
customer_reviews.text: We are using this speaker in a club to make announcements. It works great. Easy to plug into the laptop. And loud enough to be heard throughout. The only reason for four out of five stars is that there is a lot of buzzing and snapping when we first plug the speaker into the laptop and it continues until we connect our sound system. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: clarkann

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the Tascam DR-05x digital recorder. For whatever reason the playback on that thing is barely a whisper. I bought this speaker hoping to boost the volume to actually be able to HEAR my recordings... I have to say that being impressed doesn’t nearly cover what I think of this little speaker! The volume of it is shocking! The clarity is amazing! I would recommend this speaker to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Sound is decent but a bit hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Biggest downfall is that it does not have a USB cord. It has to be plugged in to an outlet to be used, which is really inconvenient. The sound is pretty good. I use it to amplify the sound on my computer for streaming. The price was ok, but if I were to buy one now I would make sure that it had the USB capability.
customer_reviews.author: skinnydog

customer_reviews.title: Terrific compact speaker with good sound
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker for the price. Its not perfect, sound not extremely crisp and there is no volume control on it, but it gets sufficiently loud using the volume control on your phone. I use it in my office at work and it takes up very little space on my desk and fill my office with music to keep my work productivity high. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doctorii

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Works nicely with my Kindle. Helps me hear my Kindle better. Plugs in and works with the volume control on the kindle itself. Happy with purchase. Con: Must be plugged in for each use. Must be unplugged after each use. There is no on off switch on the speaker. There is no volume control on the speaker. Must be unplugged after use as it makes a humming noise.
customer_reviews.author: Doll33y

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad speaker, but it doesn't have a volume fader
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad speaker, but it doesn't have a volume fader, so it relies on the source to control volume. I used it for a Raspberry Pi build, and since there was some static on the output at low volume, the speaker would transmit all of the pops and hisses. I had to switch to a speaker with volume controls so that I could provide a cleaner input at full power.
customer_reviews.author: CBU

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker with one drawback
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding little speaker, but it has one significant shortcoming. If you leave the speaker plugged in permanently to your sound device, no problem. But if you frequently unplug and re-plug it, you'll get a nasty hum each time you do. (An off/on switch would have avoided this, but probably upped the cost a bit, too.)
customer_reviews.author: Frank in Miami

customer_reviews.title: what a great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great little speaker. I needed something to use with my laptop for presentations to small groups in a conference room and this fit the bill. I am impressed with the sound quality and loudness for the small size (easy to transport). I have an older laptop without Bluetooth connectivity and this one comes with an AC adapter.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, would be better with its own volume control
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker in my kitchen for listening to music and podcasts while I cook. It is unobtrusive, and sits in a corner out of the way, but is powerful enough to hear even when the stove ventilation and the sink are running at the same time. The only thing I wish was different is the lack of a volume knob: I have to adjust the volume from my device instead, which works, but sometimes means my ears get blasted before I can adjust the sound. A volume knob would make this good little speaker into a great little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: weird feedback
customer_reviews.text: Pros: small design, decent sound for a single speaker. Cons: 1) In using it for two weeks, there have been two occasions where I experienced a feedback loop. This appears to be a lack of adequate shielding in the input line, because the problem is worst when that line is near the computer power line, so it's picking up line noise. Mitigation is to keep that line as far away from any A/C power lines as possible. 2) no power switch, or volume control.
customer_reviews.author: aTypicalEngineer808

customer_reviews.title: The volumne was great the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the return date has passed but- this only work 2 times- That's it! The volumne was great the first time I used it...it worked one more time after that...and that was it- That should not be...4 times in 4 weeks I used it and now I'm stuck with a "dust collector" I can not believe that it is SO STATIC-Y and sometime absolutely No Sound comes out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little speaker, good price
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great. Bought it to replace a clunky set of computer speakers plugged in to my old iPad. Got rid of the clutter. It’s streamlined and pretty, sounds great- and it’s carefree. I never have to touch it. Don’t recall what I paid, but I remember that it was a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Schochler

customer_reviews.title: The sound this little guy puts out really surprised me.
customer_reviews.text: This little unit really can put out strong sounds. There aren't controls on the unit, you control the volume from whatever device you are using it for. I just tried it out on my laptop and now on my iphone and it works great on both. I'm very pleased. For $15 this works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. A.

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPhone users!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. If you have an iPhone, save your money. This speaker works for 90 seconds before you get the error message that it “isn’t compatible with your device.” Sound quality is good, I just couldn’t get it to stop giving me the error. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Canfield

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter to use with her echo - it works great and is very portable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use with her echo - it works great and is very portable. She even brings it into the batroom with her so she has tunes while showering (not waterproof - it stays on a shelf outside the shower). The sound quality is not great, but for the price, it is better than I expected and it is more than enough for a small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Footbal Fan

customer_reviews.title: Really great for an older TV or Walkman!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this with an older CD Walkman for CDs and FM radio..it works great! Good sound..you can listen to your CDs and cassette tapes from your Walkmans. Before Bluetooth! Yes, you have to plug it into the wall and it does not have a volume control..you have to use the volume control on the Walkman. Still, so nice to be able to use this with older audio or visual equipment and not have to have headphones on. It is just what I was looking for! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: merlinraven

customer_reviews.title: Best Speaker for Echo Dot!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure of this product as it does not have a volume control, however it is now by far the best speaker I have found to connect my Echo Dot to. Warning, this thing can put out some serious sound! You will not want to start off with volume 10! We are now picking up several more for other Echo Dots and Eufy Genies that we have.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse T.

customer_reviews.title: Big sound for a small price.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. My laptop speakers had crapped out and that led me to this product. Volume controlled by whatever it is plugged into. Omnidirectional sound makes watching videos on my laptop sound like a much more expensive sound system is being used.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Performs as expected for this type of speaker.
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars for what it delivers at this price point. Weak in the high and low frequencies but clear and stellar in the mid-range. Very small footprint on my desk at home and bedside table while on travel. No nonsense setup and operation. Highly recommend this 10W outlet-powered single speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Flip_User

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kitchen TV sound
customer_reviews.text: We got this speaker to bypass the tinny speakers in a small new AXESS TV on our kitchen counter. It has made a surprising improvement in the audio from the TV. Voices are much richer. It sits atop our kitchen Alexa takes up no counter space. A great find at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: wasc

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Considering the low cost of this unit, I have no problems giving it a full five stars. Sound quality, while certainly not hi-fi, is still much better than most of the blue tooth speakers I have heard. There is no volume control on this unit. Just plug and play using your device to control the volume. It gets plenty loud without sounding harsh or scratchy. I will be purchasing one of these to plug into each Alexa Dot that we have in our home. It is about the size of a large coffee cup and so will be perfect in this use. I would recommend this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Little Lara

customer_reviews.title: Good product with some limitations.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully! I am very happy with this product. Not quite as portable as I thought it would be and more fragile than I hoped for but there is nothing wrong with the product. I'd hoped I could put it in my backpack with my laptop and use it on he go but that isn't what this was meant for.
customer_reviews.author: skl1975

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play background music in the kitchen while cooking. I didn't expect much - small speaker, low wattage. But I was very pleasantly surprised by the volume and quality. I am not claiming high fidelity sound from this speaker, but it is excellent for playing background music from my tablet or phone.
customer_reviews.author: Foggyview

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but there is a small annoyance
customer_reviews.text: Good sound out of this little speaker, and it's just what I needed. I think others have mentioned this, but there is a high-pitched sound that is noticeable and annoying when the speaker is plugged in but not in use. It's bad enough that I have to unplug it when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: greenbean

customer_reviews.title: It arrived missing a part and I have no idea what part that is but that’s what makes it work
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn’t work because it’s missing something and when I go to look at the product it doesn’t tell you what to buy to make it work very confused and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding little speaker. Better than my Bluetooth one at 1/3 the price..Buy it...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it a few minutes ago, plugged it in and this little sucker rocks. Perfect for a bedroom or a small room. For the money you can't go wrong. Used my fire tablet , just plugged it into the headphone jack and your golden.. My brother turned me on to it. He swore by if.. Will not replace a large stereo but does quite well. But it...
customer_reviews.author: Randy Manar

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mom at 96. She can hear me
customer_reviews.text: Simple to connect. Amplified the speaker. Not the best sound quality. But exactly what I needed. Mom at 96 can't hear me when we Skype. Needed something simple that worked. This was perfect. Plugs into the wall so no need to worry about battery. Plugs into the headphone jack so no need to worry about connection problems. It just works. And cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Gailbe

customer_reviews.title: Overjoyed. Great sound, easy set up took a few seconds
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I’ve made in ages! It’s fantastic! My iPad Air suffered water damage the other day, and my sound worked, but only with headphones. So - problem solved! The sound quality is SO much better I expected. Far superior to that of all my iPads. I’m overjoyed. I’m going to buy another one! Great, great product. Made my day.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: My older computer was losing its volume so I bought this inexpensive speaker. It's good for the price. PROS: Helps amp the sound. CONS:Slight sound distortion. You have to plug into a wall socket for the power source which makes it less portable. I would recommend one that uses your comp or batteries for power. UPDATE- After 4 months, the speaker no longer works !
customer_reviews.author: Beach Glass

customer_reviews.title: Amplify volume easily with this speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works really well. I use it with my tablet and it amplifies the volume to a level that is easy to hear clear across the room. This is an inexpensive way to boost the volume. Easy to use. Plug the speaker into the wall outlet. Hook the 3.5 mm speaker wire into the device. Start the device and adjust the volume with the device's volume control. Could not be easier!
customer_reviews.author: Jonie Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Sound and volume are great. We thought this was battery operated and it needs to be plugged into a wall outlet. The cord isn't all that long so it's more of an inconvenience. We'll keep looking for one that runs on battery only.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: nice speaker with a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: nice sound. small footprint. but since it does not have a built in volume control is kinda a pain - have to go into WINDOWS to adjust volume. these are in an office and we don't have volume controls on the keyboard. if you do - makes it easier. but again, sound is surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Ok but causes RFI for radio communication devices.
customer_reviews.text: I bought so it could plug into a radio receiver that only has mono output. One speaker is all that's required for mono. It works fine in that area but it produces too my RFI in the form of hum. I had to thread the power jack and the audio jacks through ferite beads. That cured the problem for the most part. It may cause interference on other devices too.
customer_reviews.author: PD-Wythe

customer_reviews.title: Great sound  A great value.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound quality at low volume. I use this speaker to listen to my electronic audio Bible as I go to sleep. Even with the lower volume I find it easy to clearly hear the Scriptures even without my hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: To the Right of Attila  the Hun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Echo Dot
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It has decent sound quality and like my Dot needs only a small area. Plugs into the wall so it’s always on like my Dot and never needs charging. I just wish it was still available in silver and black. Not a fan of the white but I love the speaker so I plan to get another anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Prettytoyz

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker.  Logitech products have always worked well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a speaker for my laptop and this is perfect. I can now hear what I want to from my laptop perfectly. I used it fir listening to music last week out by our pool, and when volume is maxed, there was just a bit of distortion, but not that bad. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a power button
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds ok. Pretty loud for its small size. There is no power button on it so you have to make sure to connect it to your device before powering your device up (otherwise you may hear popping noises). In my opinion it would be better if it had a power button.
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it is
customer_reviews.text: For small spaces, where you need something better than your computer's built-in speakers, this is perfect. Don't expect home-theater quality, but do expect good sound in a small package.
customer_reviews.author: JTK Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker For The Cost!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker to go with my Amazon Echo Dot. I am more than happy with the cost/quality of the speaker. When listening to music on your echo dot the sound quality is really nice. I highly recommend this product to buyers looking for a less expensive good sounding speaker. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Has to stay plugged into wall and device
customer_reviews.text: Has to be plugged into an outlet as well as device it doesn't make it very portable that's for sure. I will be buying something else for my tablet it does have good sound but I wanted something simple to plug into my tablet not being stuck to an outlet to
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Garbage dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Broke like 3 days after I got it. When it did "work" it sounded like a cat being smacked against a brick wall
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price, audio is better than expected
customer_reviews.text: We are using this speaker for a TV in our travel trailer. Sound is much better than the tin cans they use for sound in a 24 inch LED TV. Audio level is controlled by the source (laptop, TV, phone) so you can use your TV remote. Only wish this speaker had an on/off switch. I got around that by using a switched plug adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Make America Purple Grape Again

customer_reviews.title: muddy sound but the form factor fits my needs
customer_reviews.text: ... enough that I can live with the low quality sound. since it's part of an airplay network, speakers in the next door room balance the missing bass and treble.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rambo

customer_reviews.title: great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I can hear again. =-) had a hard time hearing some of my Dance teachers( since we are now doing classes remotely) . this totally solved the problem. feel like it is a great speaker at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: T. Life

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of Logitech devices and have generally had good experiences. This speaker - not so much. When powered on and not connected to a source, it makes a low but audible sound as if someone left a mic open somewhere. When plugged into the back of my ASUS monitor, I got the same noise, only amplified significantly. Plugging it into my iPhone was not much better. Will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Really Loud
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super loud...feels well-built and sturdy, though I’ve only had it for a day. Logitech is always reliable for making a good product. For the price you absolutely will not find a better speaker. Only gripe is that it requires 2 cables (1 to connect to a power outlet and the other into a headphone jack.)...although it wouldn’t be nearly as loud if it were powered through a USB (which can only supply 2.5 watts compared to the power supply’s 10 watts)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all devices with volume control can control this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I found this useful for another application. However, the volume control of my internet radio failed to recognize the device. Be aware that its default volume setting is highest.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Wiedenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Z50
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price and the size. Remember, this isn't a bluetooth speaker. It was exactly what I was looking for and sounds Great!
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great for for its size
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it weighs almost nothing, and for my computer, it gives me a nice sound both for movies and music. For the money - worth it. I actually bought one and then purchased it again for my classroom computer.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Superb little addition for your Echo Dot and other components
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to my Amazon Echo Dot, it really makes it sound a lot better.... Love it so much that I ended up ordering 2 more for my other Dots... If you have Dots I highly recommend this addition at a superb price... It will make Alexa sound much clearer and louder (*_*)
customer_reviews.author: CK2019

customer_reviews.title: Just Makes Sound
customer_reviews.text: Do you need your computer to make sound and you don't want to put any more thought into it than that? Then get this speaker. Plug it into your sound source (it has a 3.5mm plug) and plug another cord into power, and you've now set up this speaker. There are no volume nobs or bass settings or other junk. You control volume on the device generating the sound. This speaker can get really loud. I usually keep my computer output around 50%.
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: Will not satisfy those who expect audiophile quality.  But how could you expect better at such a low price?
customer_reviews.text: 5 W, 10W peak. Packs a punch at such a low price. Loud enough for small room. But do not expect high quality sound (esp. music reproduction. Vastly improves the built in Echo Dot speaker. I would compare to a single speaker table radio. Installing is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Homer Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Oh Boy, Does This Do The Trick!
customer_reviews.text: It does! My poor laptop does double duty as my TV show streaming device. I don't own a TV since my old one broke a couple of years ago. I use PBS.org, Hulu, Netflix and of course Amazon Prime for watching shows on the 4 year old laptop. The speakers just weren't up to the task. Explosions and music were fine, but voices were drowned out. The Logitech Multimedia Speaker Z50 is PERFECT. It's kinda big, but not too big for where I have it. I hear EVERYTHING now. I even have to turn the sound down on some shows. Thanks, Logitech! You always come through with electronics I need.
customer_reviews.author: craftergin

customer_reviews.title: Sound Clarity
customer_reviews.text: We really like this speaker. Sound is clear and just what we need because you just plug it in and don't have to charge it before. I would buy it again and definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: I can hear sound on my computer again
customer_reviews.text: I've been without sound for quite a while now with my all in one computer thinking I'd never find a device that would give me sound again. This one does and it's great. Easy to use. Just plug in. Reasonable price. Nice looking...much better than some of the ugly old speakers that are out there. Only thing that worked for me...glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: patties2cats

customer_reviews.title: very nice to have a corded speaker, unable to adjust volume on unit, need to use volume on device
customer_reviews.text: It is a good speaker and looks like photo. Super happy to have a corded speaker, as unfortunately, most speakers are now blue tooth (only). I did know based on a review that there was no volume adjuster and I'm okay with that, but buyers should know about it. I use it on a laptop to play Youtube, etc in the background while I'm doing dishes...so is great for that extra volume boost.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I was at first happy with this but within 1 year it would no longer work and sound became crackled and speaker unusable - disappointed hoped to use longer
customer_reviews.author: M. Rinaldo

customer_reviews.title: Burned out after 6 months of normal use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June to aid in hearing the sound level on my laptop when I wasn't wearing earphones. It worked well, but, it only lasted 6 months. One night it just stopped working, became very warm and seemed to burnout. I know it didn't cost a small fortune, but I expected more then 6 months use.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Works well on a laptop that did not have a loud enough speaker. This was low-priced relatively speaking, and have used it for a couple months without problems. No controls or adjustments on the speaker, use your PC volume controls to adjust. I would say the sounds are roughly twice as loud as my laptop PC speaker, which helps while it may not be loud enough for some (if you are looking for real loud or high amplification - this is not a good choice for you). Plug into PC and an electrical outlet and it's ready to go. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: m_r_f

customer_reviews.title: It is lacking any device specific vol control
customer_reviews.text: That is a bit tough to get used to... but it is more than acceptable for sound and certainly a great value... great footprint for crowded spaces
customer_reviews.author: NLW

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker for work. It has a good sound quality and volume control. I really like that it is small and can easily fit on a desk.
customer_reviews.author: RQuinn

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality in a small package
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was added to bypass my laptop which has very poor speaker system. I was mainly looking for just a small speaker to fit in a limited desk space. I purchased this speaker not expecting much quality for about $20 but found the speaker to be very good. I think it is a great speaker when space is limited and two-speaker stereo is not important.
customer_reviews.author: William E Farris

customer_reviews.title: Hardwired!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker because I thought it had a 3.5 mm input .But it's comes with a 3.5mm hardwired type. Therefore, if the cord goes bad you can't disconnect and use a new one. I was misinformed because someone decided to post (Frequently bought together item) 3.5mm male to male audio cord that I bought with this speaker, just in case the (hardwired ) one goes bad. I don't need the extra cord because it's no way to connect it.Good thing it wasn't expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fine on a positive note. However, there is no on and off switch and have to unplug when not in use. If you do not, it will hum until you do. It serves the purpose, but the little thing matter.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love this Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this great little speaker and I can't say enough good things about it. I was looking for a speaker for my mini pc that doesn't have a speaker. This is just the ticket. Plugged it into the earphone jack and the ac outlet and it was good to go. The sound is great, and I'm enjoying not having to wear earphones when I want to listen to something on the pc. Would highly recommend this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hart

customer_reviews.title: Broke quick
customer_reviews.text: Bought on January 23 and Broke by April 7th. Poor quality, even if it was not costly.
customer_reviews.author: MCD

product_meta.title: Z50 for smartphone, tablet and laptop - Grey
product_meta.description:
Color:Grey| Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

Enlarge

LOGITECH MULTIMEDIA SPEAKER Z50 (GREY)
SMALL SPEAKER. BIG VOICE. 
Play your favorite music, YouTube videos, and streaming movies from your smartphone, tablet or laptop - out loud in any room - with this ultra-portable mini speaker. A 3.5mm audio line in makes it super simple for you to plug in just about any audio device and listen to all your multimedia entertainment in surprisingly powerful sound. 

Blue | Pink

PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS
 * Portable mini speaker for smartphones, tablets, or laptops
 * Plug-and-play 3.5mm audio line in
 * Powerful 2.25-inch driver
 * 10W peak power
 * AC power - no need to recharge
 * Three eye-catching colors

SURPRISINGLY LOUD
The 2.25-inch driver produces 10W of peak power for unexpectedly loud sound from a small speaker.

SMALL FOOTPRINT
The mini speaker is compact, portable, and easy to move from room to room - giving you the freedom to play your favorite music all around your home.

USE WITH MULTIPLE DEVICES
The 3.5mm audio line in enables you to connect and listen to your multimedia through multiple devices.

NO BATTERIES OR RECHARGING
The mini speaker uses an AC power supply. Just plug it in to a wall outlet for reliable power without battery hassles.

Enlarge

PLUG AND PLAY
Designed for plug and play simplicity, just connect the speaker to your smartphone, tablet, or laptop.

Enlarge 

PICK YOUR COLOR
The Z50 comes in three eye-catching colors that add a splash of style to any living space.

COMPATIBILITY
WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 * One speaker
 * Power supply
 * User documentation

WORKS WITH:
Audio devices with 3.5mm output including: * Windows and Mac OS computers
 * Smartphones
 * Tablets
 * MP3 players

COMPARE
WHICH LOGITECH SPEAKERS ARE RIGHT FOR YOU?

Better

Multimedia Speakers Z200

Speaker System Z320
